links.title: Apple, Intel Could Become First to Adopt TSMC's 2nm Node
links.description: (Image credit: Shutterstock) Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Corp. is set to start high volume production of chips using its N2 (2 nm-class) process technology in late 2025 and deliver the first batch of these chips in early 2026. According to two media reports and sources within the financial community, the first customers to adopt N2 will be Apple and Intel.

body:
$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $FB $NVDA 

My thoughts on the mkt action this past week 

First off, ive consistently been telling my members that these big rallies are bear mkt rallies, that I am a seller into any strength. And it hasn't been easy to remain in that camp  - not when the "experts" on CNBC  continously tout how bullish they are.  Not when we have 150 handle rallies in just three days. But I've been in multiple bear mkts and that is exactly the type of action you get. 

My Game Plan for next week  goes out on Sunday and it may be my most important one yet (email me at jessielivermore1929@gmail.com if you want to join). 

Why so important? Because next week is one of the most important weeks this mkt has had in years. Big cap tech earnings are going to create a massive selloff or a relief bounce. PCE is going to spark future fear or a calming effect. And our technical levels are going to be tested. 

For those who subscribe, I look forward to sending out this weekend's Game Plan Sun ✌️
$AAPL ER next wk, will an apple a day keeps the doctor away?
